channel.title: Need Help with adding "Your Coordinates"!
channel.description: OK you know right in player controls theres that little spot where some people put owner is: (name here)...... Well i want to make it so it shows your coordinates..... HELP PLEASE!!!! I actually did this once before but i forgot how.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 20, 2008, 12:25:56 pm[/size][hr]Can anyone help me?

item.title: Need Help with adding "Your Coordinates"!
item.dc:creator: @WRX WRX`
item.description:
@WRX wrote:

lol.

You got the id of where you want it sent?

For telling the players coord you would use:

absX - Players X Coordinate
absY - Players Y Coordinate

Read full topic
